li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName = "VCE_AppleTree" or defName = "VCE_PeachTree" or defName = "VCE_CherryTree" or defName = "VCE_PlumTree" or defName = "VCE_PearTree" or defName = "VCE_PeachTree" or defName = "VCE_Opuntia" or defName = "VCE_BearBerryBush" or defName = "VCE_BananaTree" or defName = "VCE_OrangeTree"]/plant/mustBeWildToSow
